A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it! Best one since Empire! Rose is a refreshing addition to the franchise\, and the various themes explored in the movie tied into every single character. The biggest shock of the movie is there for everyone to see at the end of the film\, but intentionally left vague so that it can play out in part 9. It was a masterfully directed film\, with a great script\, and Hamil delivered the performance of his career.
